channel.title: Getting Started on Gorgonia
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Gorgonia

item.title: Ubiquitous Language and glossary
item.description: This page holds various definitions and glossary that will help you to understand Gorgonia and to communicate with the team (via PR or issues) Tensors inner(most) dimension(s) - given a shape, the inner dimensions tend to the right. e.g. in a shape (2,3,4), the inner dimensions are (3, 4). The innermost dimension is 4. outer(most) dimension(s) - given a shape, the outer dimensions tend to the left . e.

item.title: Start contributing to the doc
item.description: If you want to get started contributing to the Gorgonia documentation, this page and its linked topics can help you get started. You don’t need to be a developer or a technical writer to make a big impact on the Gorgonia documentation and user experience! All you need for the topics on this page is a GitHub account and a web browser. If you’re looking for information on how to start contributing to Gorgonia code repositories, refer to the Contribution guidelines.
